output: To design a chess playing AI, the first step would be to develop a program that can recognize and understand the rules of the game of chess. This program should have the ability to recognize valid moves and be able to predict possible future positions given a current board state. The program should be able to evaluate game positions and board configurations to identify the best possible move. Additionally, the program should have the ability to adapt its strategies based on the moves of its opponent and understand strategies such as divide and conquer, clutter and confusion, material-based strategies, calculating tactics, etc.
